main_definition: In an educational context, 'pupils' refers to students or learners, typically in a school setting. It can also describe the part of the eye that controls the amount of light entering it.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Students in a school or educational institution
meanings_and_examples.example: The teacher called on three pupils to answer the question.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The part of the eye that controls the amount of light entering it by dilating or constricting
meanings_and_examples.example: When exposed to bright light, her pupils automatically became smaller to protect them from damage.
